documents.document: @FoodieDiaries I do love my coffee + happy to try, but can't imagine it. Did flashback to chicory coffee I once tried! (Great article btw!)
For breakfast, there's no more congee-nial way to start the day.. 🇲🇾 @chikitchenfood #malaysianfood #breakfast… https://t.co/d5J7xeUrF1
@DeterminedDiner @OgniskoRest thanks Lucy! (they don't always come off!..)
@SavlaFaire @BrasserieZedel definitely on my 📝.. (how's your weekend looking?)
'Hey barista, theres fungus in my coffee!' 'Sorry, theres wasnt mush-room in the fridge.'☕🍄 For more on this flavor… https://t.co/144EcKlRsX
Food this good, you'll Polish it off + be full-to-borschting in no time.. 🇵🇱 @OgniskoRest #lovelondon #fdbloggers https://t.co/9PJCtvGItd
@rovingchefLdn @snigskitchen @nomadic_gardens was gonna pop in this week, but something else came up. Missin' my Roving Cafe fix, Hayley..😢
Top tastin' tacos in town? 🇲🇽 - you'd breddo believe it!..👊 @breddostacos #fdbloggers https://t.co/lHYK0FWxa6
@SavlaFaire @BrasserieZedel @MeeraMistry still never been. Need to remedy that asap!
@Baddiel that was most brotherly of him, in keeping with the previous tweet on his timeline..
@snigskitchen hope things settle down for you too.. x
@snigskitchen plus a couple of cinema trips! All best X
@snigskitchen all fine here! Have had week off work - v welcome after busy time. Lots of eating too (of course!)..
@snigskitchen hi Snigdha, hows things? Hope youre keeping well! ☺️(btw if u like Shoreditch streetart check @rovingchefLdn @nomadic_gardens)
How does a #Foodie stick it to #Trump? Post recipes from the 7 banned countries, that's how. Great gesture..👍… https://t.co/lIrBnZvE0i
Finale to food-week was @108Garage. These guys are totally in the zone. And their love of cookery shines in the foo… https://t.co/kl64lA2BQ7
@CharAimeeClarke @FrancoMancaPizz I always go for this - my favourite pizza there!
@theCuriousPixie @108Garage thanks Sima!..
Some issues are just too important to remain silent on. How can a foodie stick it to #Trump? This.. #LoveTrumpsHate… https://t.co/g2NU0JvU0w
With Kiln hitting the spotlight, thought I'd try @SmokingGoatSoho. Totally loved it. Food, atmo, service, fantastic… https://t.co/8jsyKPR0Ow
@theCuriousPixie been off work this week (yay!) Great catching up with friends, food, film + food-blog writing! Now off to @108Garage..
@theCuriousPixie no probs Sima! Hope you're having a good week..
@RoamingRequired @britishmuseum I agree, it's mind-blowing at times. I usually try catch one of the free tours they do throughout the day..
Walking around #britishmuseum can humbling. Take this Babylonian battle scene. Iraq's sadly seen many. But this ar… https://t.co/BWNI448e92
@DanMalakin @smokestakUK that's only coz I think I've actually turned into a cow.. 🐮
@NancyRothery1 @ChicknSours @SavlaFaire @MrRajPop food was great! Also delicious aubergine dish too.. (hope you're having a good week too!)
@FreshnFearless good luck with the job!..
Ate my weight in cow tonight @smokestakUK. Brisket + ribs + cheek. Good stuff! (great catching up with @DanMalakin too..) 🐄
@FreshnFearless congrats Aftab! That's great news. What will you be doing?..
@waywardeater went @ChicknSours last night. Really impressed too!..
"Sweet dreams are made of cheese. Who am I to dis a Brie!" (Binny's pun making me laugh too much, I camembert it no… https://t.co/kZcH7fB19l
@cakeandwhisky @KoyaBar such a special place. I love it at breakfast when it's all so calm..
To kick off Day 3 of London food trail, its another fave breakfast. When it's damp + bustling outside, @KoyaBar is… https://t.co/uluUnfVTX1
@MrRajPop @ThoughtOfTrying @ChicknSours @SavlaFaire I somehow missed them! (I guess I just have to go back.. 😉)
@pickyglutton know what you mean - what IS that cat wearing?!.. (😉)
@binnyjs you too Binny! (and we totally have to meet up sometime!
@MrRajPop @ChicknSours @SavlaFaire know what you mean! But that chicken WAS amazing..
@SavlaFaire thank you again for @noblerotbar tip. Fell in love with the place from the off. Food was just beautiful. Service so friendly. 😍
@SavlaFaire thanks Seetal! Totally with you on that, even if only dipped in for a cheeky pud. And bone marrow. Needs more research I think!
Day 2 London food trail ended on kpop Korean fried chicken @ChicknSours. Chick-full o' flavour. Great seeing… https://t.co/9DI3gLWDUL

🌭 Merguez Roll 🌭
(one of my fave breakfasts in London..) #foodporn #Foodie #sausages #breakfast #brunch… https://t.co/B2BblOgAZU
@laurahinton 'Simple Greek Lamb' from @DianaHenryFood #crazywater is one of my all time faves.. https://t.co/AIJNfHyS1Q
@chazloveswine thanks for sharing Chaz!
@DeterminedDiner @noblerotbar @SavlaFaire @MrRajPop always great to find a place that you immediately wanna go back to..
Burrata + Wine + @noblerotbar = 😍 (..thanks for rec @SavlaFaire @MrRajPop!) https://t.co/twBKdoa6jm
@binnyjs so sorry to hear Binny. I can imagine it puts a real dampener on things. But sounds like you've decided to break out from it?..
@binnyjs good luck with it, Binny! Hope you find something great..
🍑 Breakfast Mezze 🍑 (starting Day 2 on London food trail with a fave brunch place..) #Foodie #foodporn #brunch… https://t.co/LKra81LtgD

🌈 Samosa Mutter Chat 🌈
#foodporn #Foodie #fdbloggers #foodphotography #Food https://t.co/SMoqcqWtsz https://t.co/6vQ6HqwYBL
@NancyRothery1 @SavlaFaire @Londonfarmers thanks guys! I think with roasts, sometimes keeping it simple is best. Let the meat shine!
@HutchinsonSean @garyjberry @worldsendmarket @SimonJOwen @Fox__PR sad to hear..
@HutchinsonSean @garyjberry @worldsendmarket @SimonJOwen @Fox__PR sad to hear that Sean. Was defo this place, not another W.E establishment?

🌸 Chuski Falooda & Rose Petal Kulfi 🌸
(yummy way to end Day 1 of a London foodie trail..) #foodporn #Foodie… https://t.co/KF0pnJuq1A
At the world's end, the steaks can't get much higher.. @worldsendmarket #fdbloggers https://t.co/7gdtdazr8k
Each day Trump's a total arse, I'm gonna post my #AntiTrump rant. That'll keep me busy. #StandUpToTrump #NoBanNoWall https://t.co/ETokI87GD8
@binnyjs thanks Binny! Sounded lots of fun too..
No need to book a table, but you may need to design one! (+ you'll be inamo-ured with the art!) @InamoRestaurant… https://t.co/yGvDa3nxfG
@NancyRothery1 @SavlaFaire lucky to have Wimbledon @Londonfarmers on my doorstep. Some superb meat stalls (+ not bad value too!)
@SavlaFaire @NancyRothery1 thanks guys! It's always a winner at ours!..
@SavlaFaire they're ok out in Vancouver, thanks, though shocked by Trump etc. Glad to see Canadian PM #Trudeau making a stance..🇨🇦
Its not just Kricket, its celebrating diversity/tolerance - much needed in some parts #mondaymotivation #NoBanNoWall https://t.co/QTWZLFzt2Y
@SavlaFaire so much so shocking at the moment. Just need to carry on, do what we can to stand up vs bigotry + appreciate our open city..
@NancyRothery1 @connieconsumes food + friends over = gr8. But spent hours & hours writing stuff for work. At least I'm off for a week now! 🙆
@tamsin_lim @PetitPoisBistro like the 'before' & 'after' chocolate mousse shots, Tamsin! Looks a great find..
@NancyRothery1 @PollenStSocial @connieconsumes nice turbot Nancy!! 👍 (Was that for your big fish supper last weekend?..)
@GbWalls thanks for sharing! ☺️

🐏 Sunday Roast Lamb 🐏
#SundayLunch #SundayRoast #roastlamb #roastdinner #Foodie #foodporn https://t.co/tmJyRMg9wJ https://t.co/MENjtYDjfC
🐓 Saturday Roast Chicken 🐓 (well it is the Year of the Rooster!) #foodporn #Foodie #yearoftherooster… https://t.co/VWwroCQtbt
@stephpgold happy birthday Steph! 🎂
"It's tur-bot at-Pollen-guys, It's tur-bot.." 🎶🎤 #toolatetoapologise #badpun #sorry @PollenStSocial https://t.co/aaix9Cdf7z
Sorry 4 re-posting my piece on how immigrants built America. #Trump just keeps givin' me reasons to do it #MuslimBan https://t.co/ETokI7Q5ey
I'd choose the gourd, @rocketandsquash. "Follow the gourd, the Holy Gourd.." 🌰 #LifeOfBrian #MontyPython… https://t.co/lkBsr65Ltc

🐟 Three Little Fishies 🐟
#fish #foodie #foodporn #foodphotography #foodpic https://t.co/ucnAtjX718 https://t.co/gIOqRY4Uk1
@EppieShepherd great place for clouds and skies too!! 📷
@EppieShepherd where did you get to in the end? Hope the pics come out well!..
@FoodieDiaries have you any particular plans this weekend?..
@FoodieDiaries @Cinnamon_Bazaar no probs! Such a good place too! Have a great weekend..
For great Indian food, this is cinnamon-gst the best in London.. @Cinnamon_Bazaar #fdbloggers https://t.co/kjNqPSsXET

🐟 Mackerel Mosaic 🐟
#fish #foodie #foodporn #foodphotography #blackandwhitephotography #Wimbledon #farmersmarket… https://t.co/pqmNAX3DRN
@SavlaFaire @MrRajPop @hampsteadmkt @Broadway_Mkt thanks loads! May need to take more leave..
@SavlaFaire @noblerotbar wow, that's high praise, hard not to go now! Any dishes stand out?..
@MrRajPop @SavlaFaire that's a great idea too! Any faves?..
@NancyRothery1 the world can never have too little celebrating!..
@NancyRothery1 is breakfast too soon? Perhaps on my porridge!.. (thanks for all the shares - you're a champion Nancy!)
@SavlaFaire love @QualityChop, but not yet been @noblerotbar. But heard good things. Very good things..🍷🤔
@SavlaFaire hmm, so true. And besides, I'll never say no..😉 #sweetfeast
@SavlaFaire @MrRajPop @GymkhanaLondon @Socialeathouse both gr8 places! Mmm, food for thought! Thanks for the recs..👍
@MrRajPop although not sure if espresso martinis are the cure for my insomnia..😉
@MrRajPop the less said the better! All I can say is 🐲🐙👗🐸👽🎩️ (+ perhaps a little of 🎶🎸🐮) #whathappensindreamsstays..
To all those celebrating #chinesenewyear, kung hei fat choi + Happy Year of the Rooster! #KungHeiFatChoi #GongXiFaCai #HappyChineseNewYear
@SavlaFaire got @smokestakUK, @108Garage + @ChicknSours (of course!) lined up. And still time for couple more! Have ideas, but any recs?..
@SavlaFaire aw that's really kind, but no worries! (Luckily Tooting's close by if I need a gulab jamun fix!)
I do love my #whisky. But keep forgetting even the weeniest dram keeps me up half the night + gives me whisky dreams the other half..🍷=🐲🐙👗🐸😵
Wow, trilateral talks between #Trump, #TheresaMay + @bbclaurak. Felt like a strange game of rock/paper/scissors. Laura won.. #maytrump
@SavlaFaire so glad to be off this week. Will be eating my way thru London + some writing too. Look forward to catching up with you!
@SavlaFaire have a great weekend! Will you be bringing back any treats from home? #gulabjamun #yesplease 😉
#SpentHens are surely the way forward to save the world. Thanks @jamieoliver for putting them in the spotlight.. 🐓🔦🌍 #FoodFight
@le_petit_oeuf there's always a plaice for them..
@CloHutch_ eating my way thru London, wine-tasting + lotsa writing 📝! Hope u have relaxin' time!..
@Cinnamon_Bazaar thanks guys! hope it'll be soon!
